name: Book Universe
shortDescription: Using ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB and other relevant technologies for web development, I built this site to sell used books.

name: The Adventurer
shortDescription: I built this simple site using ReactJS to give travelers a basic idea of the place before their trip.

name: Portable Learning
shortDescription: Online based platform where I have shown some online courses and students can navigate the course as per their choice. Certain courses can be shown on separate routes if desired
